RaccoonPet.Name: raccoon
RaccoonAdopt.02: I found it sitting outside the entrance to your farm!
RaccoonAdopt.03: I think it likes this place! Hey, um.... Don't you think this farm could use a good raccoon?$h
RaccoonAdopt.04: Well, little %pet... You be a good raccoon now... okay?
RaccoonPrice.Description: Changes the adoption price of the raccoon.
